page.title: 11HOUSING BEDROOMS
page.content: I keep dressing up things under there,sewing things, a pram with odds and ends in it and a jewelry box. At the bottom of my wardrobe I keep a bag of colouring books,a box full of dolls which I never play with.On one side I hang Winter clothes and on the other side I hang Summer clothes.When I feel lazy I throw my clothes either under the desk,under my bed or in the bottom of my wardrobe.These are the measurements of my bedroom,the smallest side is{3m 35cm}and the longest side is{4m 42cm.}The thing I like best in the house is my bedroom. there are six bedrooms in our house. The most common number of bedrooms in houses in this area is three.Most 10 year olds go to bed at 9 o'clock and get up at 7o'clock.Most of us sleep under duvets and we have clean bedding every two weeks.
